Package com.lukflug.panelstudio.theme

Class ClearTheme

java.lang.Object
com.lukflug.panelstudio.theme.ClearTheme
All Implemented Interfaces:
Theme
public class ClearTheme
extends java.lang.Object
implements Theme
Theme corresponding to the appearance GameSense 2.0 and 2.1 had. The parameter gradient in the constructor determines, if it appears like GameSense 2.0-2.1.1 (false) or like GameSense 2.1.2-2.1.5 (true).
